question:
The Railway Budget 2016 proposed three new freight corridors. Consider the following pairs of proposed freight corridors with their connecting places:
  1. North-South - Delhi to Visakhapatnam
  2. East-West - Kharagpur to Mumbai
  3. East-Coast - Kharagpur to Vijayawada
Which of the above is/are correctly matched?
explanation: The three proposed corridors are North-South connecting Delhi to Chennai, East-West connecting Kharagpur to Mumbai and East-Coast connecting Kharagpur to Vijayawada.
